segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a calm garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, water overflows from the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge in a steady flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinet with cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a two-step stool, reaching inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing by, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR
